text:
New England Patriots fans celebrate Super Bowl win – in pictures Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share via Email View more sharing options Share on LinkedIn Share on Pinterest Share on Google+ Share on WhatsApp Share on Messenger Close 
After a dramatic comeback, New England Patriots fans take to the streets of their home city, Boston, to celebrate the team’s victory over the Atlanta Falcons in overtime
Matt Fidler 
Monday 6 February 2017 09.06 GMT Last modified on Monday 6 February 2017 09.08 GMT 

Fans react during the first half of the match in a Boston bar Photograph: Michael Dwyer/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

No celebrations just yet … Photograph: Michael Dwyer/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

The mood improves in Tony C’s bar as the Patriots tie with the Falcons during the fourth quarter Photograph: Scott Eisen/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Yes! Fans celebrate the victory at Tony C’s Photograph: Scott Eisen/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

… and in the streets near the Boston public garden Photograph: Scott Eisen/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

… and from their cars Photograph: Scott Eisen/Getty Images

Photograph: Scott Eisen/Getty Images
